info.official_title: An Explorative Study of SHR-1701 Combined with SHR2554 and BP102(bevacizumab) for Metastatic Colorectal Cancer.

identified_line.line: * 18-75 years;

criterions.exact_snippets: 18-75 years

identified_line.line: * Histological confirmed metastatic colorectal cancer;

criterions.exact_snippets: Histological confirmed metastatic colorectal cancer

identified_line.line: * ECOG PS 0-1;

criterions.exact_snippets: ECOG PS 0-1

identified_line.line: * At least one measurable lesion (according to RECIST1.1);

criterions.exact_snippets: At least one measurable lesion (according to RECIST1.1)

and_criteria.exact_snippets: At least one measurable lesion (according to RECIST1.1)

identified_line.line: * Adequate hepatic, renal, coagulation, and hematologic functions;

criterions.exact_snippets: Adequate hepatic ... functions
Adequate ... renal ... functions
Adequate ... coagulation ... functions
Adequate ... hematologic functions

identified_line.line: * Agree to use contraception during the study and 3 months after the end of the study. Negative serum pregnancy test at screening for women of childbearing potential;

criterions.exact_snippets: Agree to use contraception during the study and 3 months after the end of the study.
Negative serum pregnancy test at screening for women of childbearing potential

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Agree to use contraception during the study and 3 months after the end of the study.
Negative serum pregnancy test at screening for women of childbearing potential

identified_line.line: * Symptomatic brain or meningeal metastases (except for those whose BMS disease is stable for at least 4 weeks);

criterions.exact_snippets: Symptomatic brain or meningeal metastases
BMS disease is stable for at least 4 weeks

not_criteria.exact_snippets: BMS disease is stable for at least 4 weeks

identified_line.line: * Prior treatment with immune checkpoint inhibitors;

criterions.exact_snippets: Prior treatment with immune checkpoint inhibitors

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Prior treatment with immune checkpoint inhibitors

identified_line.line: * Received the following treatments before the first study treatment;

criterions.exact_snippets: Received the following treatments before the first study treatment

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Received the following treatments before the first study treatment

identified_line.line: 1. Major surgery within 28 days before treatment (tissue biopsy for diagnostic purposes is permitted).

criterions.exact_snippets: Major surgery within 28 days before treatment
tissue biopsy for diagnostic purposes is permitted

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Major surgery within 28 days before treatment

and_criteria.exact_snippets: tissue biopsy for diagnostic purposes is permitted

identified_line.line: * Patients voluntarily enroll in the study.

criterions.exact_snippets: Patients voluntarily enroll

identified_line.line: Healthy volunteers allowed

criterions.exact_snippets: Healthy volunteers allowed

identified_line.line: Must have minimum age of 18 Years

criterions.exact_snippets: minimum age of 18 Years

identified_line.line: Must have maximum age of 75 Years

criterions.exact_snippets: maximum age of 75 Years

identified_line.line: * The patient has had other malignant tumors within 5 years (except cured basal cell carcinoma of the skin and carcinoma in situ of the cervix);

criterions.exact_snippets: other malignant tumors within 5 years
cured basal cell carcinoma of the skin
criterions.criterion: cured basal cell carcinoma of the skin

criterions.exact_snippets: carcinoma in situ of the cervix
criterions.criterion: carcinoma in situ of the cervix

identified_line.line: 2. Prior use of immunosuppressive medications, excluding nasal and inhaled corticosteroids or physiologic doses of systemic steroids (i.e., no more than 10 mg/d prednisone or equivalent pharmacologic doses of other corticosteroids) within 7 days before treatment;

criterions.exact_snippets: Prior use of immunosuppressive medications
excluding nasal and inhaled corticosteroids
excluding ... physiologic doses of systemic steroids
criterions.criterion: physiologic doses of systemic steroids use

criterions.exact_snippets: no more than 10 mg/d prednisone or equivalent pharmacologic doses of other corticosteroids
within 7 days before treatment
criterions.criterion: time since last immunosuppressive medication use

identified_line.line: 3. Received immunomodulatory drugs within 3 weeks before treatment;

criterions.exact_snippets: Received immunomodulatory drugs within 3 weeks before treatment

identified_line.line: 4. Received live attenuated vaccine within 28 days before treatment;

criterions.exact_snippets: Received live attenuated vaccine within 28 days before treatment

identified_line.line: 5. Receipt of other antitumor systemic therapy within 28 days prior to treatment;

criterions.exact_snippets: Receipt of other antitumor systemic therapy within 28 days prior to treatment
criterions.criterion: receipt of other antitumor systemic therapy

identified_line.line: * Presence of any active autoimmune disease or history of autoimmune disease with expected relapse;

criterions.exact_snippets: Presence of any active autoimmune disease
history of autoimmune disease with expected relapse

identified_line.line: * A known history of allogeneic organ transplantation or allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation

criterions.exact_snippets: A known history of allogeneic organ transplantation
A known history of ... allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation

identified_line.line: * Human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection or known AIDS, untreated active hepatitis, HBV-DNA ≥ 2500 IU/ml and abnormal liver function; hepatitis C or co-infection with hepatitis B and hepatitis C;

criterions.exact_snippets: Human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection or known AIDS
untreated active hepatitis
HBV-DNA ≥ 2500 IU/ml
abnormal liver function
hepatitis C
co-infection with hepatitis B and hepatitis C
criterions.criterion: co-infection with hepatitis B and hepatitis C

identified_line.line: * A history of interstitial lung disease or non-infectious pneumonia, etc.;

criterions.exact_snippets: A history of interstitial lung disease
A history of ... non-infectious pneumonia

identified_line.line: * Within 6 months before enrollment, the following conditions: myocardial infarction, severe/unstable angina, NYHA class 2 or greater cardiac insufficiency, and clinically significant supraventricular or ventricular arrhythmia requiring clinical intervention; hypertension with poorly controlled by medications;

criterions.exact_snippets: myocardial infarction
severe/unstable angina
NYHA class 2 or greater cardiac insufficiency
criterions.criterion: NYHA class 2 or greater cardiac insufficiency

criterions.exact_snippets: clinically significant supraventricular or ventricular arrhythmia requiring clinical intervention
criterions.criterion: clinically significant supraventricular or ventricular arrhythmia

criterions.exact_snippets: hypertension with poorly controlled by medications

identified_line.line: * A history of severe bleeding within 3 months (>30 ml at a time) or hemoptysis within 1 month (>5 ml at a time) or a thromboembolic event (including pulmonary embolism, cerebral infarction, etc.) within 12 months;

criterions.exact_snippets: A history of severe bleeding within 3 months (>30 ml at a time)
A history of severe bleeding within 3 months (>30 ml at a time)
A history of severe bleeding within 3 months (>30 ml at a time)
hemoptysis within 1 month (>5 ml at a time)
hemoptysis within 1 month (>5 ml at a time)
a thromboembolic event (including pulmonary embolism, cerebral infarction, etc.) within 12 months

identified_line.line: * Surgical treatment (except biopsy) within 6 weeks or unhealed surgical incision;

criterions.exact_snippets: Surgical treatment (except biopsy) within 6 weeks
unhealed surgical incision

identified_line.line: * Long-standing unhealed wounds or fractures that have not healed properly

criterions.exact_snippets: Long-standing unhealed wounds
Long-standing unhealed wounds
fractures that have not healed properly

identified_line.line: * Imaging showing that the tumor has invaded a vital vascular perimeter or if, in the judgment of the investigator, the patient's tumor has a very high likelihood of invading a vital blood vessel and causing a fatal hemorrhage during therapy

criterions.exact_snippets: Imaging showing that the tumor has invaded a vital vascular perimeter
in the judgment of the investigator, the patient's tumor has a very high likelihood of invading a vital blood vessel
criterions.criterion: likelihood of tumor invading vital blood vessel

criterions.exact_snippets: causing a fatal hemorrhage during therapy
criterions.criterion: risk of fatal hemorrhage during therapy

identified_line.line: * A history of abdominal fistula, gastrointestinal perforation, intra-abdominal abscess, or active gastrointestinal bleeding within 6 months before the first study treatment

criterions.exact_snippets: A history of abdominal fistula
A history of ... gastrointestinal perforation
A history of ... intra-abdominal abscess
A history of ... active gastrointestinal bleeding within 6 months before the first study treatment
A history of ... active gastrointestinal bleeding within 6 months before the first study treatment

requirement.expected_value: within 6 months before the first study treatment

identified_line.line: * Urine routine showed urine protein ≥2+, and 24-hour urine protein level >1.0g;

criterions.exact_snippets: Urine routine showed urine protein ≥2+
24-hour urine protein level >1.0g

identified_line.line: * Unable to take the drug orally, or has a condition judged by the investigator to affect the absorption of the drug;

criterions.exact_snippets: Unable to take the drug orally
condition judged by the investigator to affect the absorption of the drug

identified_line.line: * Pregnancy, lactation, and unwillingness of reproductively active subjects to use effective contraception;

criterions.exact_snippets: Pregnancy
lactation
unwillingness of reproductively active subjects to use effective contraception

identified_line.line: * Other conditions deemed by the investigator to be ineligible for inclusion in the study.

criterions.exact_snippets: Other conditions deemed by the investigator to be ineligible

identified_line.line: * Allergy to the study drug or any of its excipients;

criterions.exact_snippets: Allergy to the study drug
allergy to ... any of its excipients
